meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were planted in a quincuncial pattern, with one in the center and four at the corners.
meanings.sent2: The quincuncial layout of the trees in the park created a beautiful and balanced design.
meanings.sent3: The quincuncial arrangement of the cupcakes on the tray made it look like a floral display.
meanings.sent4: Her quincuncial hairstyle, with a braid at each corner and one in the center, was truly unique.
meanings.sent5: The quincuncial distribution of stars in the night sky formed a perfect diamond shape.

meanings.definition: Having five parts or elements arranged in a square with one at each corner and one in the center.
meanings.sent1: The quincuncial design of the quilt featured a different pattern in each corner and one in the middle.
meanings.sent2: The cake was decorated with a quincuncial arrangement of colorful candies on top.
meanings.sent3: The quincuncial layout of the board game confused the players as they tried to strategize.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace had a quincuncial pendant, with four small gems at the corners and a larger one in the center.
meanings.sent5: The quincuncial structure of the building allowed for a central courtyard surrounded by five wings.
